step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose.
Great inhale! Try to tighten your whole body muscles a bit more and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Nice exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you relax your muscles.
Good start for the second rep. Remember to maintain a comfortable posture and place hands on your abdomen.
You're placing your hands well. Continue to inhale slowly through your nose for this step.
Good inhale and muscle tightening. Focus on visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you complete the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep up the good work with visualizing fluid movement.
